sentence.Network_en: Few men have had such transcendental capacity to stir the heart of people.
sentence.Network_cn: 很少人有如此超群出众的打动人心的才能.

sentence.Network_en: He is regarded as one of the great transcendental idealists .
sentence.Network_cn: 他被认为是一位伟大的先验的观念论者。

sentence.Network_en: It is entirly proper to classify Kant as a transcendental idealist.
sentence.Network_cn: 把康德化为先驻的唯心主义者是完全正确的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 先验（TRANSCENDENTAL）还得区别于超验（TRANSCENDENT），前者指虽然不依赖经验但还是在经验之内。这个概念的提出是 …
超越(transcendental)作为哲学范畴是一个引进的概念，在西方哲学中,对这一慨念从未有过一个约定俗成的界定。但这并不影响人们在 …
[vi] 先验的（transcendental）、现象学的（phenomenological），作为一种与经验主义相对立的“方法”，是普遍的；而由这种普遍方 …
石油英语词汇(T3)--石油百科 ... transcendental function 超越函数 transcendental 超越的 transcerse bulkhead 横舱壁.

list.abs: transcendental function 超越函数transcendental number 超越数transform 变换；转换
超越方程(transcendental equation)是包含超越函数的方程[1],也就是方程中有无法用自变数的多项式或开方表示的函数,与超越方程相对的是代数方程。超越方程的求解无法.
trajectory 轨；轨迹transcendental function 超越函数transcendental number 超越数
...典和理论，悟出的一套基于瑜伽术的简易修炼法门，称为超觉静坐（Transcendental Meditation），或者叫作超觉冥想，简称TM。
超觉冥想（Transcendental meditation）是冥想的简化版。它简单易行但也很有效果。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from medieval Latin transcendentalis (see transcendent)

entry.tran: 超验的;超越一般常识(或信念)的
entry.def: Transcendental refers to things that lie beyond the practical experience of ordinary people, and cannot be discovered or understood by ordinary reasoning.

means.word_mean: 1. existing outside of or not in accordance with nature;

sentences.sentence: "find transcendental motives for sublunary action"-Aldous Huxley

means.word_mean: 2. of or characteristic of a system of philosophy emphasizing the intuitive and spiritual about the empirical and material

auth_sentence.content: These considerations...were below the transcendental dignity of the Revolution Society.
auth_sentence.res_content: These considerations...were below the transcendental dignity of the Revolution Society.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These considerations...were below the transcendental dignity of the Revolution Society.

auth_sentence.content: The substitution of transcendent censorshipwith a transcendental self-censorship.
auth_sentence.res_content: The substitution of transcendent censorshipwith a transcendental self-censorship.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The substitution of transcendent censorshipwith a transcendental self-censorship.

auth_sentence.content: Who and what fulfills that transcendental need is the question.
